title: Bloomberg Markets: McMillan on Lack of Market Volatility
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: McMillan on Lack of Market Volatility
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Brad McMillan\u0010Chief Investment Officer\u0010Commonwealth Financial Network\u0010Discussing why the market isn't reacting to drama from Commonwealth Financial National Conference in San Diego.
